alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Duchesne County through 330 PM MDT... At 255 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tabiona, or 15 miles northwest of Duchesne, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tabiona, Starvation Reservoir, Utahn and Talmage. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 71 and 81. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 42 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
